results.title: Targeting the Electron Transport System for Enhanced Longevity.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Sirolimus @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020123 @@@Rapamycin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ are the most extensively studied longevity drugs.

citations.NLM: Radovic M, Gartzke LP, Wink SE, van der Kleij JA, Politiek FA, Krenning G. Targeting the Electron Transport System for Enhanced Longevity. Biomolecules. 2025 Apr 23;15(5):. PMID: 40427507
citations.BibTeX: @article{40427507, title={Targeting the Electron Transport System for Enhanced Longevity.}, author={Radovic M and Gartzke LP and Wink SE and van der Kleij JA and Politiek FA and Krenning G}, journal={Biomolecules}, volume={15}, number={5}}

results.title: Metformin Associated Lactic Acidosis in Clinical Practice - A Case Series.
results.text_hl: A risk score assessment which includes severe comorbidities may help to identify high-risk individuals and should be evaluated in larger studies.To prevent @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@MALA@@@, @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ should be trained to immediately interrupt their own @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use when showing signs of @<m>DISEASE_Visceral_myopathy_familial_external_ophthalmoplegia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536350 @@@volume depletion@@@.

citations.NLM: Schädle P, Tschritter O, Kellerer M. Metformin Associated Lactic Acidosis in Clinical Practice - A Case Series. Exp Clin Endocrinol Diabetes. 2021 Nov;129(11):842-847. PMID: 32403137
citations.BibTeX: @article{32403137, title={Metformin Associated Lactic Acidosis in Clinical Practice - A Case Series.}, author={Schädle P and Tschritter O and Kellerer M}, journal={Exp Clin Endocrinol Diabetes}, volume={129}, number={11}, pages={842-847}}

results.title: Comparative effectiveness of cardiovascular, renal and safety outcomes of second-line antidiabetic drugs use in people with type 2 diabetes: A systematic review and network meta-analysis of randomised controlled trials.
results.text_hl: SGLT2i were associated with increased risk of @DISEASE_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D007239 @@@genital infection@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Visceral_myopathy_familial_external_ophthalmoplegia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536350 @@@volume depletion@@@ (high certainty), amputation and @DISEASE_Ketosis @DISEASE_MESH:D007662 @@@ketoacidosis@@@ (moderate certainty).

citations.NLM: Sim R, Chong CW, Loganadan NK, Fong AYY, Navaravong L, Hussein Z, Khunti K, Lee SWH. Comparative effectiveness of cardiovascular, renal and safety outcomes of second-line antidiabetic drugs use in people with type 2 diabetes: A systematic review and network meta-analysis of randomised controlled trials. Diabet Med. 2022 Mar;39(3):e14780. PMID: 34962662
